# Xeepy - Python X/Twitter Automation Toolkit
# Educational toolkit for X/Twitter automation using browser automation

## Overview

Xeepy is a comprehensive Python toolkit for X/Twitter automation. It uses 
Playwright browser automation instead of the expensive Twitter API ($100-5000/month).

### Key Features

- 12 Scrapers (replies, followers, following, tweets, hashtags, search, etc.)
- Follow/Unfollow Operations (non-followers, mass unfollow, smart unfollow)
- Engagement Automation (like, comment, retweet, bookmark)
- Monitoring (unfollower tracking, account monitoring, keyword alerts)
- AI Integration (OpenAI GPT, Anthropic Claude, Ollama local models)

### Quick Start

```python
from xeepy import Xeepy

async with Xeepy() as x:
    # Get tweet replies
    replies = await x.scrape.replies("https://x.com/user/status/123")
    
    # Unfollow non-followers  
    await x.unfollow.non_followers(max_unfollows=100)
    
    # Auto-like by keyword
    await x.engage.auto_like(keywords=["python"])
    
    # Check who unfollowed
    report = await x.monitor.unfollowers()
```

### Installation

```bash
pip install xeepy
playwright install chromium
```

### CLI Usage

```bash
xeepy auth login
xeepy scrape replies <url>
xeepy unfollow non-followers
xeepy engage auto-like "keyword"
xeepy monitor unfollowers
```

## API Reference

### Scraping

- `x.scrape.replies(url, limit)` - Get tweet replies
- `x.scrape.profile(username)` - Get user profile
- `x.scrape.followers(username, limit)` - Get followers
- `x.scrape.following(username, limit)` - Get following
- `x.scrape.tweets(username, limit)` - Get user tweets
- `x.scrape.hashtag(hashtag, limit)` - Get tweets by hashtag
- `x.scrape.search(query, limit)` - Search tweets

### Follow/Unfollow

- `x.follow.user(username)` - Follow a user
- `x.follow.by_hashtag(hashtag, limit)` - Follow users from hashtag
- `x.follow.by_keyword(keyword, limit)` - Follow from search
- `x.unfollow.non_followers(max, whitelist)` - Unfollow non-followers
- `x.unfollow.everyone(dry_run)` - Mass unfollow
- `x.unfollow.smart(days_threshold)` - Smart unfollow

### Engagement

- `x.engage.like(url)` - Like a tweet
- `x.engage.auto_like(keywords, limit)` - Auto-like by keywords
- `x.engage.comment(url, text)` - Post comment
- `x.engage.retweet(url)` - Retweet

### Monitoring

- `x.monitor.unfollowers()` - Detect unfollowers
- `x.monitor.account(username)` - Monitor account changes
- `x.monitor.keywords(keywords)` - Monitor keywords

### AI Features

- `ai.generate_reply(text, style)` - Generate AI reply
- `ai.analyze_sentiment(tweets)` - Sentiment analysis
- `ai.detect_bot(profile)` - Bot detection
